basics.name: Dr. Alex Chen
basics.label: Principal Engineer & Technical Leader
basics.summary: Accomplished technical leader with 12+ years driving innovation in distributed systems, cloud architecture, and engineering excellence. Proven track record of building high-performing teams and delivering scalable solutions that serve millions of users. Passionate about mentorship, open source contribution, and advancing industry best practices.

work.name: CloudScale Technologies
work.summary: Lead architect for distributed data platform processing 500TB+ daily across global infrastructure.
highlights: Designed multi-region event streaming architecture achieving 99.99% uptime
Led team of 15 engineers across 3 continents, delivered 8 major releases
Reduced infrastructure costs by $2.5M annually through optimization initiatives
Established engineering standards adopted across 200+ person engineering org
Mentored 12 engineers, 4 promoted to senior roles within 18 months

work.name: DataFlow Inc.
work.summary: Technical lead for real-time analytics platform serving 10M+ daily active users.
highlights: Built real-time data pipeline processing 1M events/second with <100ms latency
Architected microservices migration from monolith, improved deployment frequency 10x
Championed observability practices, reduced MTTR by 65%
Filed 2 patents in distributed computing and data compression

work.name: Innovate Labs
work.summary: Full stack engineer building customer-facing SaaS applications.
highlights: Developed API gateway handling 50K requests/second
Implemented automated testing framework increasing code coverage from 20% to 85%
Led migration from PHP to Node.js, improving performance by 3x
